mapper.update: update cfg_module_type set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where module_type_id = #{moduleTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select module_type_id, parent_id, code, `name`, `type`, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, sort, del_flag from cfg_module_type where module_type_id = #{moduleTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
